name: IGI Commando Jungle Strike 3D
description:
IGI Commando Jungle Strike 3D game is a combination of all the commando action and sniper mission games, you are going to act like an bravo IGI Commando commando shooting game, an elite sniper commando and army commando at the same time commando action game 3d. IGI Commando Jungle Strike is action commando game, which have an extreme Commando action IGI game environment and full hardcore combat commando shooting weapons.
IGI Commando Jungle Strike 3D game have two environments in which first in Jungle environment and second is Desert environment. Both environments have multiple levels and different weapons for shooter mission survival war Commando game. Keep an eye on RADAR to detect the enemies position. Use the Zoom button to aim the enemy from far distance. Army commando shooter completed great combat shooter mission as allone bravo elite commando in attack of forces in sniper mission game. IGI commando has one mission in army commandos camps in this survival war at high above the mountains in the jungle and desert.

Kill the last seen commandos enemies before they would kill you as a last commando. You have the map and locations and movement of sniper shooter enemies provided on a radar system. Use your bravo army commando skills and kill the forces commandos enemies wandering across your way. Encounter the enemies with arms, Ak-47, Snipers and Shotguns in this shooter mission survival war. Aim perfect for the attack of shooter forces in this shooter mission survival war 3d game. Stare down your sniper scope, zoom in to find and identify the target. Take a breath...and pull the trigger to kill your shooter enemies in this commando game.

Elite commando is assigned one mission for murder the last enemy step by step as per instructions so wander around the place and find the sniper shooter enemies one by one and kill them all to complete all levels. You have to get a radio and synchronize it to the head quarter and get instructions about your missions. At the end you will be picked up by your own army crew at the safe place indicated.

Elite sniper commando which is the last bravo shooter is the only surviving commando of an attack of forces in commando shooter mission.
IGI Commando Jungle Strike 3d game is like a survival war in hardcore commando in which the last bravo shooter escape from the assassin forces camps for his survival against forces shooter mission call.
IGI Commando Jungle Strike is an Extreme challenging really shooter mission action commando 3D game.

Last IGI Commando Jungle Strike is shooting game is best battle sniper shooting game against enemy forces, the best shooter survival sniper game all the time.


IGI Commando Jungle Strike 3D Features:

- Realistic Graphics.
- 3D Environment that gives the real commando feeling. 
- The last Person Shooting. 
- Excellent Jungle and desert Environment for sniper shooter Commando. 
- Realistic effects and new challenges in shooter mission survival war. 
- Outclass sound effects, Background and shooting sounds. 
- Easy and intuitive controls. 
- Multiple addictive levels.
- Addictive game play.
- Its a paid game available on app store.
